name: Ripwave Racing DEMO
description:
GET READY!

This is the 0.1 alpha demo for Ripwave Racing, an arcade speedboat racing game.

CURRENT FEATURES
- 3 game modes
- 1 stage
- 4 difficulties for CPU opponents
- 5 boats
- Supports both keyboard and gamepad  ( gamepad recommended )
 

CONTROLS

Keyboard:
- Steering & throttle / brake:    Arrow keys / WASD
- Select options:    Enter
- Back / Exit / Pause:    Escape
- Change view mode:    X
- Respawn:        Z ( hold )
- Toggle fullscreen:    F4

Gamepad: ( controls for Dualshock / Switch controller )
- Steering:        Left stick
- Throttle:        Right trigger
- Brake:        Left trigger
- Look around:        Right stick
- Select options:    Button1 ( CROSS / B )
- Back / Exit:        Button3 ( SQUARE / Y )
- Change view mode:    Button4 ( TRIANGLE / X)
- Respawn:        D-Pad down ( hold )
- Pause / Options:    START / OPTIONS

GAME MODES

Race:    
    Race against CPU opponents & try to finish 1st. No time limit. CPU skill level depends on difficulty setting.

Arcade:    
    Classic time attack. Race against the clock, checkpoints extend your time. Available time depends on difficulty setting.

Time Trial:
    Free racing without CPU opponents or time limits. Try to get the best race time.

BOATS

Max Speed:     Maximum speed
Acceleration:    How fast the boat can accelerate
Turning:    How fast the boat turns ( determines both the turning "acceleration" and maximum amount of turning )
Handling:    How easy the boat is to handle ( how fast it responds to steering, how much it slides in curves )
Weight:        How much collisions with other boats affect the boat  ( heavier boats are affected less )
Stability:    How much the water affects the boat ( boats with better stability are easier to handle on rough waters )

Created with Game Maker: Studio 2.3.
